sqlMap.select: select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(mon) = UPPER(#mon#) UNION select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(mon) like UPPER(#mon#) ||'%' UNION select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(mon) like '%'|| UPPER(#mon#) ||'%'

select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(eng) = UPPER(#eng#) UNION select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(eng) like UPPER(#eng#) ||'%' UNION select * from Dictionary WHERE UPPER(eng) like '%'|| UPPER(#eng#) ||'%'
sqlMap.statement: insert into Dictionary (ENG, MON, DESCMON, DESCENG, CREATEDUSERID, CONFIRMEDUSERID, STATUS) VALUES (#eng#, #mon#, #descMon#, #descEng#, #createdUserId#, #confirmedUserId#, #status#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE Dictionary SET mon = #mon#, eng = #eng#, descmon = #descMon#, desceng = #descEng#, Status = #status#, CONFIRMEDUSERID = #confirmedUserId# WHERE ID = #id#
